nodes.text: Tyrral Jerikko was a male Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul living during the war against Zakuul. By the time Empress Vaylin took the Eternal Throne, he was a Battalion Commander in the ranks of the Knights of Zakuul. In 3630 BBY, Jerikko was part of the Assault on Odessen initiated by the Empress against the Alliance. He was part of the force that attempted to seize the Gravestone while the vessel was in dry dock, however during the battle he was attacked by Lana Beniko and the Alliance Commander and was killed.
Tyrral Jerikko appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VIII: End Times".
